title: Cu(II) inhibited the transport of tetracycline in porous media: Role of complexation
content:
Environ. Sci.: Processes Impacts, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EM00210E, Paper
Chang Xu, Bo Gong, Shan Zhao, Xiaomin Sun, Shu-Guang Wang, Chao Song
Tetracycline (TC) and Cu(II) coexist commonly in various waters, which may infiltrate into the subterranean environment through runoff and leaching, resulting in substantial ecological risks. However, the underlying mechanisms of...
